title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: There has been a lot of talk on Youtube this week on Kaspa and it has made me wary , why the hype all of a sudden? A few months ago it pumped to its all time high price of £0.0343 but has now fallen back down to £0.01 exactly. The sudden craze on Youtube has me wary and made me question a few of the channels I follow.Is Kaspa any good or is this likely a new scam?

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Remember there's risk in anything you're doing and always considers that nothing is permanent, investing on crypto projects you aren't familiar with because you just hears of their names or hype they made in recent times is a very risk in it highest order, you need to invest o a currency that have developed good reputation over years and are well recognized, imagine am just only hearing it name for the very first time, though there are thousands of them we cannot know all but it's more safer to go for the ones we are familiar with than those that can't be trusted with their hype.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on May 24, 2023, 09:24:53 AMThere has been a lot of talk on Youtube this week on Kaspa and it has made me wary , why the hype all of a sudden? A few months ago it pumped to its all time high price of £0.0343 but has now fallen back down to £0.01 exactly. The sudden craze on Youtube has me wary and made me question a few of the channels I follow.Is Kaspa any good or is this likely a new scam? Just checked and $Kas seems to be trending in twitter as well with over 2.4M tweets.It listed to Kucoin 18 days ago and after that price has been in a free fall so it was totally sell the news event. Kas doesn't sound like a scam at all, but i don't see how it's relevant either. Price however is in full panic mode and most likely this hype campaign is launched by community to pay influencers etc in order to keep the price up. That doesn't seem to work. It has dropped a lot and i would wait for the price to stabilize for a long time before entering as project with this kind of flash crash doesn't recover fast.

comments.author: fribroon1
comments.body: There is no community funding to pay for influencers! Where did you bring it from??? Kaspa is super legit and the price action is pretty amazing along this year.

comments.author: bussybuddy
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on May 24, 2023, 09:24:53 AMThere has been a lot of talk on Youtube this week on Kaspa and it has made me wary , why the hype all of a sudden? A few months ago it pumped to its all time high price of £0.0343 but has now fallen back down to £0.01 exactly. The sudden craze on Youtube has me wary and made me question a few of the channels I follow.Is Kaspa any good or is this likely a new scam? Not only KAS, but I think the DAGchain concept that is mentioned a lot in some projects in this market has also helped it have an amazing price increase in this market context.Actually, I think there is a certain strength, but they are legit and have not had any problems, I am quite impressed with the way they have pushed the price of KAS up so well, really interesting. The potential this coin is achieving is amazing.
